short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will lookup for a Tibia character with name of selected text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple Google Chrome extension which make it easy to look up a Tibia character.

Imagine you are reading a Tibia forum and somebody mentioned a Tibia character name. You want to check this character, so you:
1. Go to tibia.com (sometimes you have also to click "Already registered" link)
2. Click "Community".
3. Click "Characters".
4. Type the character's name (or copy & paste it from the forum page).
5. Finally you can read about the player.

With this simple extension you just:
1. Select the character's name on the forum page.
2. Right click on the selected text.
3. And click "Lookup Tibia character...".

The player's page is opened for you in new browser tab!
